Andaman Islands - Tour Package

  • Andaman Packages

Book travel packages and enjoy your holidays with distinctive experience

  • Location : Andaman , India
  • Price : 11999/-
  • Duration : 4Night 5Days
  • Book Now

The Best of Andaman Islands

Description

Port Blair-door to the sun, sand and surf of the normal magnificence supplied Andamans. Port Blair-door to the sun, sand and surf of the normal excellence invested Andamans. An ideal nirvana for the metropolitan occupant, encompassed in a bit of the unaltered from days of yore. Unaltered is the profound speed of life collapsed in the wraps of time. Waiting noticeable all around is the debauchery of frontier rule, unaltered despite time and tides. Unaltered are the remotest sky of biodiversity far eliminated from the biting real factors of urbanization, a visit to this place that is known for the unaltered and unimaginable is a shocker and a conjurer. A smooth arrival at veer Savarkar International air terminal and a two-km drive carries you to the humming capital of Andaman and Nicobar, Port Blair. Leftovers of the British time cast long shadows on the city roads just as on the spirit while the unmatched virgin excellence of the sea shores encloses you by a fluffy warmth. Mild breezes kiss your hair and skin quickly shipping you to cheerful tropical days to come.

Inclusions

  • Accommodation : On twin-sharing basis in hotels mentioned, or similar
  • Meals : Daily breakfast and dinner at all the places (except on day 1)
  • Water Activity : Complimentary session of scuba diving at Havelock for 01 pax

Detailed Day Wise Itinerary

  • Day 1:Port Blair

    Arrive in Port Blair and you will be taken to your hotel where you can relax and rest After lunch, proceed for local sightseeing of Port Blair Visit Corbyns Cove Beach Later, you will be taken to Cellular Jail (closed on Mondays) to enjoy beautiful Light and Sound show The evening is free for leisure activities

  • Day 2:Havelock Island

    After breakfast, you will proceed from Port Blair to the beach paradise known as Havelock Island (around 54 km from Port Blair) by cruise/ferry On arrival, proceed to your hotel In the afternoon, proceed to Beach No 7* (Radhanagar Beach) rated as the best beach in Asia by the Time Magazine Watch a mesmerizing sunset on Beach no.7 before returning back to your hotel to relax and unwind

  • Day 3:Havelock Island

    Pre breakfast, leave for scuba diving Scuba diving is the great ways to explore the beautiful underwater marine life Swim among schools of fish, admire the beautiful corals and enjoy the serenity of underwater life The coastal belt surrounding Andaman & Nicobar Islands is the abode of one of the richest coral reef ecosystems in the world The coral reefs and under water formation are untouched by human activities (optional, cost not included) After breakfast, you will be taking a cab to visit Kalapathar Beach Enjoy at the place with white sands and many photo stops The place is famous for the amazing coral-line starting as deep as just one meter below the surface Enjoy some of the best water sports activities Overnight stay at the hotel

  • Day 4:Port Blair

    After breakfast, you will transfer to jetty for the ferry to Port Blair Upon arrival in Port Blair, we will head out for a city tour of Port Blair In the evening, enjoy dinner cruise with live music Sail around Port Blair and enjoy food, live music and Nicobari songs for next 2 to 2.5 hrs Return for an overnight stay at the hotel

  • Day 5:Departure

    After breakfast, you will be transferred to the Port Blair airport in time to board your flight Depart Port Blair with fond memories of these mesmerizing islands
